settings.section_content: If your product meets the eligibility criteria, you can initiate a return by following these steps:

settings.list_items: Contact our customer service team at support@ibertechsystems.com to request a Return Authorization Number (RAN)|Provide your order number and a brief description of the product and reason for return|Once approved, package the product securely in its original packaging and include the RAN|Ship the product back to us at the provided address. settings.section_content: Upon receiving and inspecting the returned product, we will process your refund within 7-10 business days. Refunds will be issued to the original payment method used for the purchase. Please note:
